subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The parents of Derek Boogaard say the union, after initial discussions with them after Boogaard’s death, did not meet a deadline to file a grievance seeking the final three years of his Ranger salary.
snippet: The parents of Derek Boogaard say the union, after initial discussions with them after Boogaard’s death, did not meet a deadline to file a grievance seeking the final three years of his Ranger salary.
